globals
    // Generated
    trigger                 gg_trg_Melee_Initialization = null
    
    
    unit                    gg_trg_Primary_Footman = null
    integer                 gg_MaxHealth = 425
endglobals

function CreateUnitsForPlayer0 takes unit u returns boolean
    // comment
    local unit u = CreateUnit( p, "hrif", 379.5, -619.2, 147.716 )
    local integer unitID = 71
    local trigger t = rr_SomeOtherTrigger
    local real life = 55.52
    
    set u = CreateUnit( p, 'hrif', 379.5, -619.2, 147.716 )
    
    if life == 55 then
        call Hello()
    elseif not udg_True then
        call ok(5, "hello")
    elseif (true and true) or false then
        call Strange()
    elseif udg_IsTriggerEnabled then
        call ThisIsTrue()
    elseif notEnabled == "notEnabledNope.." then
        call Nope()
    else
        call Yay()
        set helloWorld = "yes this is nice"
    endif
    
    local unit myNewUnit = CreateUnit(Player(15), 'uloc', 0, 0, 0)
endfunction

function MyAwesomeThing takes integer i, real r returns nothing
    local integer myInt
    
    // some looping code to print numbers :)
    
    loop
        set i = i - 5
        set i = i*99
        call PrintNumber(i)
        exitwhen i == 14
    endloop
endfunction

function myEmptyFn takes nothing returns nothing
endfunction
